Food.name: Café de Flore
Food.description: One of Paris’s oldest cafés, famous for croissants, espresso, and street-side atmosphere.
Food.recommend: Order a café au lait and people-watch like a Parisian.

Art.name: The Louvre Museum
Art.description: Home to world-famous art pieces like the Mona Lisa and Venus de Milo.
Art.recommend: Go early morning to avoid crowds.

Architecture.name: Eiffel Tower
Architecture.description: The symbol of Paris offering panoramic views over the Seine and city skyline.
Architecture.recommend: Visit at sunset when the lights turn on.
